text: Ej mu'minon, ʙo musrikoni sitamgar ʙardavom ʙicanged, to digar fitnae ʙaroi musalmonon ʙoqi namonad va din tanho dini Alloh savad. Pas, cunon ki in maqsad hosil sud, na kustor hast na cang. Pas agar onho az cangidan ʙo sumo dar Mascidulharom ʙozistand, sumo ʙo onho tacovuz nakuned va har kase, ki sitam karda ʙosad, ʙa andozai sitame, ki kard, cazo doda mesavad
